title: Mobile Learning-Based Job Competency Enhancement Program: Applying Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A project-based environment for practicing elementary language education professionals to solve job-related problems using mobile technology.

learning_goals: Learners can design ≥3 knowledge-sharing systems among peer teachers using mobile apps.
Learners develop ≥1 mobile learning module incorporating gamification elements.
Learners can apply the five-stage design thinking process to solve specific language education problems in workplace settings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
